name: Empire Falls
summary: mpire Falls is a two-part mini-series that aired on HBO in 2005. It was based on the eponymous 2001 novel by Richard Russo. The mini-series was nominated for and won multiple awards, including various Emmys and Golden Globes. It was directed by Fred Schepisi.
